Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute at Ashland/Fulton
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Fulton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #N5 South Shore Night Bus Temporary Reroute at South Shore Drive/80th
ShortDescription: N5 South Shore Night Buses are rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 79th, Exchange and 83rd due to fire department activity near South Shore Drive/80th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#N5 South Shore Night Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 79th, Exchange and 83rd due to fire department activity near South Shore Drive/80th.

Allow extra travel time.
